name: Downlets
short_description:
With Downlets you can download:
- Apple Quicktime Movie Trailers
- Norton Antivirus Windows Definition Files and make them active (Replace Life Update)
- Linux McAfee Virus files (with Eicar Test)
- All avaible Dilbert Comic Strips (one month back)
